Description_lang: Opens a mystic portal for $d. Every ${$t1*3} sec, it summons a spirit of your order's fallen Ox, Crane, or Tiger adepts for $s4 sec.Fallen $?$C1[Ox]?$C2[Crane][Tiger] adepts assist for an additional $s3 sec, and will also $?$C1[attack your enemies with Breath of Fire]?$C2[heal with Enveloping Mist][assault with Fists of Fury].
AuraDescription_lang: Summoning Ox, Crane, and Tiger adepts through the mirror.
